content: I am a Ph.D. student at Department of Economics, Stockholm University, Stockholm, Sweden. My current research interests centre around political economics, economic history, development economics, and applied microeconomics in general. I was born and raised in Nagano, Japan, before moving to Osaka for my undergraduate study, during which I spent a year studying in Bloemfontein, South Africa. Before moving to Stockholm, I spent three years in Tokyo, for my Master’s degree and 1+ years of the Ph.D. program in Economics.
